column5: So anyone here have any info from first hand use on these?  I'm looking at a group 27 for $150 locally.  thanks
Yup, I have 2 in my boat. They are great. Kawartha Battery should be cheaper...think I paid 130 for mine....but you'd have to drive to ptbo.  S.
thanks and correction on the price, $120 in fenelon at MAP
No issues with mine. Been great.
